page.title: 12Shopping Facilities
page.content: Few shops exist within the block but Asda,Simco,Dishmans and Hillard Supermarket meet the needs of most people and exist a short drive away from the area.The cheap South Yorksire Passenger bus service links people to the shops and to the town centre and a "Nipper"bus collects people who have difficulty getting to the main routes."Top Shop" at Thorpe provides a wide range of goods seven days a week.The Ecclesfield shopping centre provides a good service for the people of that locality and chapeltown centre has a good range of shops and a market that is open on two occasions each week.{
